name: ProceduRail
description:
ProceduRail is a simulation of an infinite underground rail line, with procedurally-generated track and randomised cab signalling.

This line has Automatic Train Operation, so sit back and enjoy the ride!

The next signal aspect is displayed on the left panel on the control desk, and current speed in kph is displayed on the right panel.  

ProceduRail was developed in Unreal Engine 5, and runs windowed at 1280x720 with an uncapped frame rate.

Developed for PROCJAM 2022 & 7DFPS 2022
